00025 #include <ios>

00031 #include <pdb_remarks.hpp>

00034 namespace loos {
00035 
00036   int Remarks::numberOf(void) const { return(remarks.size()); }   // Compat with PERL
00037   int Remarks::size(void) const { return(remarks.size()); }
00038 
00039   void Remarks::rangeCheck(const unsigned int i) const {
00040     if (i >= remarks.size())
00041       throw(std::range_error("Bad indices into remarks"));
00042   }
00043 
00044 
00045   std::string Remarks::get(const int i) const {
00046     rangeCheck(i);
00047     return(remarks[i]);
00048   }
00049 
00050 
00051   void Remarks::add(const std::string s) {
00052     std::string t(s);
00053     while (t.size() > 58) {
00054       remarks.push_back(t.substr(0, 58));
00055       t = t.substr(58);
00056     }
00057 
00058     std::string u = sanitize(t);
00059     remarks.push_back(sanitize(t));
00060   }
00061 
00062 
00063   void Remarks::erase(const int i) {
00064     rangeCheck(i);
00065     remarks.erase(remarks.begin() + i);
00066   }
00067 
00068 
00069   std::string& Remarks::operator[](const int i) {
00070     rangeCheck(i);
00071     return(remarks[i]);
00072   }
00073 
00074 
00075   const std::string& Remarks::operator[](const int i) const {
00076     rangeCheck(i);
00077     return(remarks[i]);
00078   }
00079 
00080 
00081 
00082   std::string Remarks::sanitize(const std::string s) const {
00083     std::string t(s);
00084     int n = s.size();
00085 
00086     if (n > 58)
00087       t = s.substr(0, 58);
00088     else if (n < 58)
00089       t = s + std::string(58 - n, ' ');
00090 
00091     return(t);
00092   }
00093 
00094 
00095 
00096   std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Remarks& r) {
00097     std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator i;
00098     int n = 1;
00099 
00100     for (i = r.remarks.begin(); i != r.remarks.end(); i++) {
00101       std::string s("REMARK                                                                \n");
00102       std::ostringstream ss;
00103 
00104       ss << std::setw(3) << std::setfill('0') << n++;
00105       s.replace(7,3, ss.str());
00106       s.replace(11,58, *i);
00107       os << s;
00108     }
00109 
00110     return(os);
00111   }
